data: Korvus, the Magnificent, Nilamo of Yoralen, picked up the telephone in his palace and said: “I want to talk to Wilneda. He is at the International Hotel in Detroit, Michigan.”
Magnificent | Nilamo | Yoralen | International Hotel | Detroit | Michigan
Korvus, the Magnificent, Nilamo of Yoralen, picked up the telephone in his palace and said: "I want to talk to Wilneda. He is at the International Hotel in Detroit, Michigan."
Smith, George O. (George Oliver), 1911-1981; Kolliker, William A., 1905-1995 [Illustrator]
